String.string: Thank you for your hard work.
Kill {@Creature:47#3001#contaminated wendigos}, {@Creature:47#3002#argonomorph wendigos}, and {@Creature:47#3003#argonomorph wendigo shamans} around {@Rgn:47004$$Blightroar} and collect tokens.
Report to Laetesha at Pathfinder Post when mission is complete.
